body_html:
Is it possible to move the CMake artifacts out of tree?

Well, cmake generally puts them in the current directory.

A work-around would have to look like this:

mkdir -p artifacts

(
cd artifacts
rm -rf *
cmake ..
)

It would be nice to have this as a script included in the repo.

body:
> Is it possible to move the CMake artifacts out of tree?

Well, `cmake` generally puts them in the current directory.

A work-around would have to look like this:
```
mkdir -p artifacts

(
cd artifacts
rm -rf *
cmake ..
)
```
It would be nice to have this as a script included in the repo.
